title: AI Square User Journey
subtitle: Six key paths for complete AI learning experience

assessment.title: Assessment

learningPath.title: Learning Path

pbl.title: PBL Practice

chat.title: AI Advisor

chat.userNeed: Who can I ask when I have questions?

discovery.title: Discovery
